title: Riot amateur company
body:
I simply dont understand why you have to ruin so much the game with unnecesary uptades, reworks, nerfs, etc.

Everything was decent before season 7 (at s5 everything started getting worse)

This game used to be funny before, but they kept adding their amateur stuff.

No one wanted the new client but they still added it, it requieres more memory and it looks strange for new players...

There were amazing champions but now they're worthless... every time they nerf or upgrade some champion they dont understand that they're CHANGING the champion role, assasins dont do shit now, junglers have to farm like no tomorrow and still underleveled.

Tanks are unkillable and adc's deal extremely high ammounts of damage, there are no good items to buy and the most loved items were removed just because people liked them.

this game had great potential but it was all thrown to trash because of this low level personnel.

oh but it seems they care alot about money, always new stuff to buy... 

you greedy company filled with incompetent people, you're killing everything funny in the game.
